greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: 0 unless n is the k-th semiprime when a(n) = k.
link: R. Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: Table[If[tbl[[i]] == 0, 0, Total[Take[tbl, i]]], {i, nn}]] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Oct 13 2012 *)
program: x (i, z, ps'@(p:ps)) | i == p = Just (z, (i + 1, z + 1, ps))
(PARI) first(n)=my(v=List(),u=vector(n)); forprime(p=2,n\2, forprime(q=2,min(p,n\p), listput(v,p*q))); v=Set(v); for(i=1,#v, u[v[i]]=i); u \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Sep 02 2015
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Apr 03 2010
